tool_description: Knowvent's API is a cloud-based heartbeat monitor and notifications hub for your business. With Knowvent developers can easily publish events to the business. Business managers can subscribe to those events they care the most about.  With Knowvent, email notifications are a thing of the past.
name: Knowvent
title: Knowvent

api_list.name: HelloWorld
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://knowvent.p.rapidapi.com/Event/HelloWorld"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "knowvent.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Publish Event
api_list.description: Used to publish an event. This is the heart of the event-publishing platform.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://knowvent.p.rapidapi.com/Event/PublishEvent"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "knowvent.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Event
api_list.description: If you need to get details on a specific event, this event accepts an eventId as query string parameter.

required_parameters.name: eventId
required_parameters.description: The Id of the Event to queried

api_list.name: Get Statuses
api_list.description: Allows you to check on the health of your processes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://knowvent.p.rapidapi.com/Heartbeat/GetStatuses"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "knowvent.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /Reporting/EventsByDateRange
api_list.description: Used to pull event data based on a date range.

api_list.name: Events By EventType
api_list.description: Used to pull event data based on a date range and event type.

api_list.name: Events By Logging Code
api_list.description: Used to pull event data based on a date range and Logging Code.
